nodes.text: The Don Bies Archive Tour was a special feature on Star Wars Trilogy: The Definitive Collection, the 1993 laserdisc release of the original Star Wars trilogy. It featured special effects artist Don Bies giving a tour of the Lucasfilm Ltd. archives. One of the props seen was Lumpy's mask, as worn by Patty Maloney in 1978's The Star Wars Holiday Special.
